text: maṉitarkaḷ ceyyum kuṟṟaṅkuṟaikaḷaip paṟṟi avarkaḷai allāh (uṭaṉukkuṭaṉ) piṭippatāka iruntāl (pūmiyil) ōr uyiriṉaittaiyumē avaṉ viṭṭuvaikka māṭṭāṉ. Eṉiṉum, oru kuṟippiṭṭa tavaṇai varai (piṭikkātu) avarkaḷaip piṟpaṭuttukiṟāṉ. Avarkaḷuṭaiya tavaṇai varum camayattil oru vināṭi pintavum māṭṭārkaḷ; muntavum māṭṭārkaḷ
